name: Cubix — Rubik’s Cube Timer & Scrambler
description: Track your Rubik’s Cube solving progress with Cubix! Get a random scramble every time you start solving, and easily time yourself right in your browser. Cubix shows your 5 most recent solve times, your personal best, and your average time to help you improve your speed and skills. Perfect for cubers of all levels who want a simple, fast, and reliable timer with scramble generation — no extra downloads needed!
